author: Peppa-Piggie
body:
Both Docebo and Ceridian have slowed down recently after the crazy growth from the March recovery, and for Docebo, they really started taking off in May 2020. 

I'm not sure if LSPD can sustain their massive run of 2020 into 2021 by continuing their current business model (130% in 6 months) 

Look at Square in October 2018, their business model up until that point was selling POS card devices that attached to headphone jacks on people's cellphones. Their stock seems to have stagnated until management decided to dabble into offering loans to businesses. 

I'm not sure if LSPD has anything innovative going into 2021 that will give them the upper edge. Mind you, there are lots of competition, Square, Shopify, Nvei, and even PayPal.
